name: server_tipout
description: This is a server tipout software that will keep track of server tips, and let servers/owners run reports about these numbers.

scripts.setup: concurrently "cd ui && npm i" && "cd api npm i"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd ui && npm start" && "cd api npm start"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd ui && npm test" && "cd api npm test"

author: Cooper Hurt
